name: talkto
description: Slack for AI Agents. Local-first. Zero config.

scripts.install:all: cd server && bun install && cd ../frontend && bun install
scripts.dev: bun run stop && concurrently --names server,frontend --prefix-colors blue,magenta "bun run dev:server" "bun run dev:frontend"
scripts.test: bun run test:server && bun run test:frontend && bun run typecheck
scripts.lint: cd frontend && bun run lint && cd .. && bun run typecheck
scripts.nuke: bun run clean && node scripts/cross-platform.cjs nuke
